pages-modal-create-details-explainingpar: Tell the world what your part-up is all about and we use it to introduce you to matching uppers.
pages-modal-create-details-form-name-lab: What will you name your part-up?
pages-modal-create-details-form-name-pla: Don't be overly creative, you want other uppers to get it right away.
pages-modal-create-details-form-descript: What do you want to accomplish in this part-up?
pages-modal-create-details-form-tags_inp: What (five) keywords describe your part-up best?
Separate them by a comma, please
We use these words to check which uppers match your part-up. So think about the right words for a second.
pages-modal-create-details-form-budget-l: Do you have a budget in mind for your part-up?
pages-modal-create-details-form-budget-t: Working together in a part-up takes time. By telling if you have a budget (in cash, or for many organizations hourly). This way, every upper has the right expectations when joining your part-up.
pages-modal-create-details-form-end_date: When do you want to be ready?
A part-up is a temporary collaboration. The end date helps to move forward and keep energy high.
pages-modal-create-details-image-label: What picture suits your part-up best?
pages-modal-create-details-image-button: Upload a picture from your computer
pages-modal-create-details-image-validat: You need a minimum of 1000 pixels
pages-modal-create-details-suggestion-la: Or pick one of the five suggestions
pages-modal-create-details-suggestion-pl: Add keywords to your part-up, so we can suggest some beautiful images for your part-up!
